dataModel.description: Summary of Project Progress for the Period
dataModel.name: progressSummary

items.preLabel: 1.1 Has there been a change to key project contacts or their details?
items.helpText: (e.g. Name, position, role, email, telephone or address of key contacts)

items.source: If yes, please provide updated details to the department

items.preLabel: 1.1 Provide a short summary of what has been achieved to date against your actions outlined in your States project proposal and progress towards meeting your short-term outcome statements outlined in your MERI Plan.

1.2 Has this project encountered any issues or delays in delivering the actions in the project's proposal and/or short-term outcome statements in the project MERI Plan?  If yes, please outline in the table below:

columns.title: How you are managing, or proposing to manage, the issue?
Implications for the project
columns.helpText: (e.g. Impacts on timeframes, feasibility, costs, ability to meet contracted deliverables)

items.preLabel: 1.3 Have there been any reportable WHS incidents this period? If yes, please provide details to the Department
1.4 Has the project risks table in MERIT been updated in this reporting period?

items.source: 2.1 Please provide good news stories that highlight what the project is doing/achieving. This information is intended for potential use by the Department in publicly promoting the program. Photos may be attached to this report via attachment to email however please ensure permissions of persons in the photos are obtained prior to the photos being attached and used for promotional purposes.

3.1 Provide a summary of:
a) what project monitoring and/or evaluation activities have been undertaken this period;
b) any key findings and/or learnings gained this period from the project; and
c) any changes you have made (or are making) in response to these.
(Detailed information, such as survey data, can be submitted as an attachment to the report).

items.preLabel: 4.1 Is the project's expenditure proceeding in accordance with the Funding Agreement, the expected rate of expenditure and within the total project budget? If you have answered no, please inform the Department of any issue(s) related to the project budget.

columns.name: extraMappingDetails

Please fill in the Mapped/Actual/Invoice fields before attaching a document here. If those fields match this field will be void.
If any of these fields differ please attach your organisation's detailed map for the area, covered by this project service - during reporting period (include the scale measure for each map).
